front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Cyber Security Requirements for Substation Automation, Protection and Control Systems

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Cyber security measures require that a balance be achieved between technical feasibility and economic feasibility, and that this balance addresses the risks expected to be present at a substation. Further, cyber security measures must be designed and implemented in such a manner that access and operation to legitimate activities is not impeded, particularly during times of emergency or restoration activity. This standard, presents a balance of the above factors.
